wikipedia_page.main:
William Chapman (dates unknown) was an English professional cricketer who played in a single first-class cricket match in 1803.
Chapman is known to have played for Nottingham Cricket Club between 1791 and 1817. He made his sole first-class appearance for a combined Nottinghamshire and Leicestershire side.

response: *William Chapman Ralston (1826–1875), American founder of the Bank of California

*William Chapman (MP for Athboy), MP for Athboy
*William Chapman (baritone) (1923–2012), American opera singer and actor
*William Chapman (doctor) (1797–1867), British-born doctor in New Zealand
*William L. Chapman II (died 2015), American shot by police, see Death of William Chapman
